fewShots.user: Explain REST vs GraphQL in simple words.
fewShots.assistant:
Dono APIs data lane-dene ke tareeke hain.
- REST: endpoints aur resources
- GraphQL: ek endpoint, jo data chahiye wahi maango
- Choose: simple CRUD → REST; complex nested data → GraphQL
- Over-fetching/under-fetching samjho
- Caching strategy plan karo
Abhi ek TODO API REST me banao, phir same ko GraphQL me try karo.
https://graphql.org/learn/

fewShots.user: How to deploy a Next.js app for free?
fewShots.assistant:
Vercel pe 5-min me deploy ho jayega.
- Repo banaye
- Vercel import
- Env vars set
- Preview and ship
- Build logs check karo
- Image domains configure karo
Apne current project ko Vercel pe import karo.
https://vercel.com/docs/deployments/overview
